name: SUPER PADS LIGHTS - Be a DJ
name_original: SUPER PADS LIGHTS - Be a DJ
description:
SUPER PADS LIGHTS - Your DJ app

The SUPER PADS LIGHTS is the new member of the SUPER PADS family
Now you already can create your own remixes and choose the light effects for each pad.

Ready to feel like a Tomorrowland DJ?

SEE THE MAIN FEATURES:
• Videos tutorials on YouTube
• Multitouch
• Lighting Effects
• Synchronicity: The lights follow the duration of each sound
• Easy to use audio editor
• Multi selection audio
• Import audios from your device library
• Easy to play
• Works on all screen formats - Mobile Phones and Tablets (HD pictures)

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
Have fun creating songs and sharing your hits on social networks with #superpadslights

Come and be part of the Super Pads universe:
Youtube.com/superpads
Facebook.com/superpadsapp
Instagram.com/superpadsapp

Do you want to send us a suggestion?
Send an email to contato@opalastudios.com.br

The app contains the following subscription options to remove ads:
- Monthly ($2.49) with a 7-day free trial period (only at the first month)
- Weekly for $0.99
- Yearly for $17.99
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is automatically renewed unless cancelled 24 hours before the renewal
- The effective monthy subscription will start right after the 7-day free trial period
- The first monthly subscription can be cancelled 24 hours before the end of the 7-day free trial period
- The subsequent monthly subscriptions are automatically renewed unless cancelled 24 hours before the next renewal (considering the day of the effective monthy subscription)
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
